startdetails-explainingpartup: Obviously your first goal is for other uppers to join your part-up. So tell the world what your part-up is all about and we use it to introduce you to great team members
startdetails-form-name-label: What will you name your part-up?
startdetails-form-name-placeholder: Don't be overly creative, you want other uppers to get it right away.
startdetails-form-description-label: What do you want to accomplish in this part-up?
startdetails-form-tags_input-placeholder: Separate them by a comma, please
startdetails-form-tags_input-tooltip: We use these words to check which uppers match your part-up. So think about the right words for a second.
startdetails-form-budget-label: Do you already have a budget for your part-up?
startdetails-form-end_date-label: When do you prefer to be ready?
startdetails-form-end_date-tooltip: A part-up is a temporary collaboration. The end date helps to move forwared and keep energy high.
startdetails-image-label: Pick a beautiful and meaningful picture for your part-up
startdetails-image-button: Upload a picture from your computer
startdetails-image-validation: You need a minimum of 1000 pixels
startdetails-suggestion-label: Or pick one of the five suggestions
startdetails-suggestion-placeholder: Add some tags, so we can suggest some beautiful images for your part-up!
